casebody.data:
LAMPORT & HOLT, Ltd., Appellant, v. Philip ELTING, Collector of Customs, Port of New York, Appellee. No. 226. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Jan. 17, 1936. John M. Lyons, of New York City (J. Alfred Anderson, of New York City, Of counsel), for appellant. Lamar Hardy, U. S. Atty., of New York City (George B. Schoonmaker, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
